SELECT scm.credit_limit_available balance FROM emp_employee e INNER JOIN st_credit_money scm ON scm.store_id = e.store_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId};
SELECT pd.balance FROM emp_employee e INNER JOIN st_pre_deposit pd ON pd.store_id = e.store_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE st_pre_deposit SET balance = balance - #{deposit} WHERE balance >= #{deposit} AND store_id = (SELECT store_id FROM emp_employee WHERE emp_id = #{userId})
UPDATE st_pre_deposit SET balance = balance + #{deposit} WHERE store_id = (SELECT store_id FROM emp_employee WHERE emp_id = #{userId})
UPDATE st_credit_money SET credit_limit_available = credit_limit_available + #{credit} WHERE store_id = (SELECT store_id FROM emp_employee WHERE emp_id = #{userId})
UPDATE st_subvention SET balance = balance + #{subvention} WHERE AND store_id = (SELECT store_id FROM emp_employee WHERE emp_id = #{userId})
